title: Kazakh Heritage Language Immersion Education: VR-Based Cultural-Connected Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational comprehension of Kazakh syntax and mastery of basic scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Targets Kazakh-origin youth residing in Russia, including those aspiring to science-related careers. They have family-based Kazakh language exposure but limited daily usage.

learning_goals: Improved ability to explain Kazakh traditional medicine and astronomy concepts in the native language through VR simulation (20% increase in pre-post assessment scores)
Production of project deliverables demonstrating accurate use of Kazakh academic terminology at ≥80% in team-based science projects
Achievement of ≥4.0/5.0 in language learning motivation sustainability surveys through culturally-identity-linked activities

resources: VR content on Kazakh science history

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
